1/4 cup of heavy cream 
50 grams of melted unsalted butter 
1 1/4 cups of all purpose flour 
1/2 cup of almond flour 
1 teaspoon of baking powder 
1/2 cup of extra dark chocolate chips 63% cacao 

Method- 
In a bowl whisk the eggs with the sugar
Add the vanilla extract, sour cream and mashed bananas
Add the butter, flour, almond flour and baking powder and mix it to a smooth mixture
Add the chocolate chips and mix gently
Pour the mixture to a greased 12-cupcake pan
Bake it in a preheated oven on 375F for 25 minutes until it‚Äôs golden
When it‚Äôs ready add powdered sugar on top and enjoy

a blender on high speed

instructions:

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è RECIPE BELOW ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

* 1 bunch of parsley

name: Its all about the magic of the pocket!
instructions:
Pita bread

4 cups of all purpose flour
2 teaspoons of dry yeast
4 teaspoons of sugar
1/2 teaspoon of salt
5 tablespoons of olive oil
1 1/2 cups of lukewarm water

Method- 

In a small bowl put the dry yeast, 1/4 teaspoon of sugar and 1/4 lukewarm water, mix it and wait 2 minutes

In a stand mixer with a dough hook, put the flour, yeast mixture and the sugar
Blend it for 2 minutes
Add the olive oil, water and salt
Blend it for 4 minutes
Cover the dough and let it rest for 30 minutes in a warm place

Let them rise for 10 minutes
Put it in the preheated oven
After 3-4 minutes you will see the magic happen and the pita will have bubbles, this is the pocket , it‚Äôs time to flip the pita and bake it just for 1 more minute

name: Mini Knotted Rolls! Fluffy with a yummy sesame crust and super easy to make!
ingredients: 1 beaten egg + 1 tablespoon of cold water
instructions:
üòç
My kids love to eat them with a jam, chocolate spread, or just like that

Mini Knotted Rolls 

Start with the yeast-
1.5 tablespoons of dry yeast
1/2 tablespoon of sugar
A quarter cup of lukewarm water
Mix in a small bowl and let the yeast activate for about a minute

5 cups of all purpose flour
 6 tablespoons of olive oil
 1/4 cup of sugar
 1/2 tablespoon of fine salt
 1.5 cups of lukewarm water

1 beaten egg + 1 tablespoon of cold water 
 
Preparation-

 - In a stand mixer fitted with a dough hook put the flour, yeast and sugar, and blend for 2 minutes
- Add the olive oil, salt and water
- Mix it until the dough is smooth and not sticky, for about 5 to 7 minutes
- Cover with aluminum foil and let it rise for about 1.5 hours
- Place it on the baking tray
Brush the rolls with beaten egg and sprinkle sesame on top
- Let it rise for another 30 minutes

üîÜ Preheat the oven to 375F

 - Bake it for about 20- 25 minutes until the rolls are golden

name: Chocolate Chip Buns! They are soft, pillowy, and loaded with chocolate chips
instructions:
Chocolate Chips Buns

Start with the yeast- 
1 1/4 tablespoons of dry yeast 
1 tablespoon of sugar 
1/4 cup of lukewarm water 
Mix the dry yeast, sugar and the water
Let the yeast work for 1 minute, the mixture should rise

1 1/4 cup of chocolate chips 

Sugar water-
1/4 cup of sugar 
1/2 cup of water
On a medium heat in a small pan mix the sugar and water together until the sugar has melt

Method-
In a stand mixer put the flour, yeast, sugar and blend it for 2 minutes 
Add the eggs and soft butter and blend it for 2 more minutes

Add the salt and water and blend it for 5 minutes 
If you feel the dough needs a little bit more water or flour, you can add it
Cover the dough with a towel or some aluminum foil and let it rise in a warm place for 1 hour, until it almost doubles in size

After the dough rises
Add the chocolate chips into the dough and knead it all together

Put the rolls on a baking sheet
Let it rise tor 30 minutes 
Brush the rolls with beaten egg
Bake it in a preheated oven on 375 F for 25 minutes

name: Date Glazed Kebabs & Potatoes!
instructions: ‚ú®Ras El Hanout is a Moroccan spice blend of an earthy mix of spices-  including cinnamon, cumin, coriander, black pepper, and ginger

Meatballs ingredients- 
2 pounds of ground meat
1 chopped shallot 
3 minced garlic cloves 
1/4 bunch of chopped parsley 
1/4 bunch of chopped cilantro
3 tablespoons of chopped celery leaves 
1 teaspoon of salt
1 teaspoon of black pepper 
1/2 teaspoon of turmeric 
1 teaspoon of Ras El Hanout 
1/2 teaspoon of ground cumin
2 tablespoons of olive oil
1 tablespoon of date syrup 
3 tablespoons of bread crumbs 

For the pot- 
‚≠êÔ∏è1 sliced sweet onion 
‚≠êÔ∏è4 finely chopped garlic cloves 
‚≠êÔ∏è10 small golden potatoes pilled and cut to halves 

üîÜSauce ingredients- 
3 tablespoons of tomato paste
1 teaspoon of salt
2 tablespoons of date syrup 
2 tablespoons of olive oil 
2 minced garlic cloves 

In a small bowl mix: 
Tomato paste, salt, date syrup, olive oil and minced garlic

Method- 
Mix all the ingredients of the meatballs and knead it for 5 minutes
Saut√© the sliced onion for 2-3 minutes until they are clear
Then add the chopped garlic and saut√© it for 1 more minute
Add the meatballs and the potatoes in one layer
Pour the sauce on top of all
Cover with lid or aluminum foil and bake it in a preheated oven on 375F for 45 minutes
You can serve it with couscous or white rice

name: Blood Orange Winter Loaf Cake!
ingredients: 2 tablespoons of powdered sugar + 2 teaspoons of water
instructions:
üçä
Ingredients- 
3 eggs
1/2 cup of light brown sugar 
1 teaspoon of vanilla 
50 grams melted butter 
Sour cream 8 OZ / 200 grams
3/4 cup of blood Orange juice
1 1/2 cups of all purpose flour
1 teaspoon of baking powder 
2 tablespoons of coconut
Pinch of salt 

‚≠êÔ∏èLoaf pan 

‚≠êÔ∏èFor the glaze- 
2 tablespoons of powdered sugar + 2 teaspoons of water
Mix it together until you get a white glaze 

Method-
In a stand mixer with a whisk tool
Put the eggs and sugar and blend it for 5 minutes until the mixture is puffy a bit
Add the melted butter, sour cream and salt and blend it for 1 minute
Pour the blood orange juice, add the flour, baking powder and coconut and blend it until the mixture is smooth

Pour the mixture to the butter greased loaf pan 
Bake it in a preheated oven on 375F for 40 minutes
When it‚Äôs ready pour the glaze on top

name: Roasted Cabbage & Fennel!
instructions:
Roasted Cabbage & Fennel 
1 small cabbage cut to chunks 
1 fennel cut to quarters 
2 slices of lemon 
2 thyme leaves 
1 teaspoon of sea salt 
5 tablespoons of olive oil
 
Method - 
In a cast iron pan, on medium heat, heat the olive oil
Place the cabbage and fennel in one layer
Saut√© the cabbage and fennel until they are golden from both sides
Add the salt, place the lemon slices on top, add the thyme
Bake it in preheated oven on 420F for 15 minutes
When it‚Äôs ready, squeeze some lemon juice and serve

name: Basmati Rice Pilaf with Dried Fruit and Walnuts!
instructions:
Ingredients- 
2 cups of basmati rice
4 cups of boiled water
1/4 cup of dried cranberries 
1/4 cup of raisins 
1/4 cup of sliced dried apricot 
2 sliced shallots 
2 minced garlic cloves
1 teaspoon of crushed cumin seeds 
1 teaspoon of crushed fennel seeds
1 teaspoon of turmeric 
1/2 tablespoons of salt 
1/3 cup of olive oil 
Toppings- 
1/4 cup of chopped walnuts 
1/4 cup of chopped dill 

Method- 
-In a skillet pan on medium heat, pour the olive oil
Saut√© the onions for 2 minutes
-Add the spices - ground cumin seeds, fennel seeds and turmeric
Mix it with the onions
-Add the dried fruit ,rice and salt, stir it together for 2 minutes
-Pour 4 cups of boiled water
Cook it on low heat for 20 minutes
When the rice is ready add the chopped walnuts and dill on top
caption_snippet:

This delicious basmati rice is studded with dried fruit, walnuts and caramelized shallots. It is scented with cumin seeds, fennel seeds and turmeric!

name: Raspberry & Walnut Rugelach!
instructions:
Ingredients-
3 1/2 cups of all purpose flour 
1 teaspoon of baking powder 
200 grams soft butter 
5 tablespoons of sour cream 
1/4 cup of powdered sugar 
1 teaspoon of vanilla extract 
2 egg yolks

Filling- raspberry jam and chopped walnuts 

Method- 
In a food processor put all the ingredients and blend it to a dough texture

Cover the dough in a plastic wrap
Put in the refrigerator for 1 hour

Divide the dough to 4 parts
On a floured surface roll each part to a circle 
Spread the jam evenly, put the chopped walnuts on top

Using a pizza cutter cut triangles 
Roll each triangle to a rugelach shape
Put them on a baking sheet 
Preheat the oven on 375F 
Bake for 20-25 minutes or until the rugelach are golden

name: SIZZLING CHICKEN SHAWARMA!
instructions:
Chicken Shawarma- 
4-5 whole chicken breast 
1/3 cup of olive oil
1 teaspoon of paprika 
1 teaspoon of cumin
1.5 teaspoons of shawarma seasoning 
1/2 teaspoon of turmeric 
1/2 teaspoon of curry powder 
1/2 tablespoon of salt 
1 teaspoon of black pepper 
1 tablespoon of date syrup 
2 minced garlic cloves 

üåüTopping- tahini, chopped parsley, sumac 

Method- 
- Put the chicken breast in a bowl, add all the spices, oil and date syrup
- Cover the bowl and place the chicken in the refrigerator for 4 hours or overnight
- On a grill pan on medium heat, put the chicken breast and grill it from both sides for 7-10 minutes each side until it‚Äôs ready and golden
When you turn the chicken breast, drizzle olive oil on top
- Put it on a nice plate, drizzle tahini,  chopped parsley and some olive oil on top
caption_snippet:

name: Chocolate Coconut Bombs!
ingredients: 75 grams / 5.5 tablespoons of soft miyokos vegan butter
instructions:
Ingredients- 
75 grams / 5.5 tablespoons of soft miyokos vegan butter 
2 eggs 
1/2 cup of coconut sugar 
2 tablespoons of brown sugar 
1 teaspoon of vanilla extract 
2 tablespoons of cocoa powder 
2.5 cups of almond flour 
1/2 cup of unsweetened shredded coconut 
1/2 cup of bittersweet chocolate wafer 

Method- 
Preheat the oven to 375F
In a mixer using the flat beater tool, mix the butter, coconut sugar and brown sugar on medium speed for 4 minutes
Add the eggs, vanilla extract, cocoa powder and blend for 2 more minutes
On slow speed add the almond flour and the coconut and blend it to a unified mix

Remove the bowl from the mixer
Add the chocolate wafer using a spatula
Bake it for 15 minutes
Let it cool a bit and powder with sugar powder

name: CHUCK ROAST STEW WITH CHESTNUT!
ingredients: 4 pounds of Chuck Roast cut to cubes of 1 inch
1/2 cup of red wine, I used Cabernet
instructions:
CHUCK ROAST STEW WITH CHESTNUT!üå∞üå∞ 
This stew has a four onion base (sweet onion, red onion ,shallots, and pearl onion)

4 pounds of Chuck Roast cut to cubes of 1 inch
2 tablespoons of all purpose flour 
2 shallots sliced
1 sweet onion sliced 
1 red onion sliced 
5 small pearl onions 
10 garlic cloves 
10 pilled whole roasted chestnuts 
1 tablespoon of kosher salt 
1  teaspoon of cumin seeds
1 teaspoon of black pepper 
1 teaspoon of smoked paprika
2 tablespoons of date syrup 
2 tablespoons of pomegranate syrup 
2 tablespoons of honey 
1/2 cup of red wine, I used Cabernet 
2 cups of water
5 tablespoons of olive oil

Method-
Season the chuck with flaky salt and pepper
On medium heat in a wide skillet pan put the olive oil
Saut√© the onions for 5 minutes
Add the garlic cloves
Season with salt, pepper, smoked paprika, cumin, date syrup, honey and pomegranate syrup
Add the wine and the water
Cover the pan with the lid
Cook it for 30 minutes on the stove on a medium heat
caption_snippet:

name: Savory Pastries are so YUMMY!
ingredients: 1 large sweet potato pilled and cut to small cubes
2 green onions cut to small slices
1. Put the sweet potatoes cube on a baking sheet. Drizzle olive oil and season with salt.
2. Put the baking sheet in a preheated oven on 430F for 15-20 minutes.
3. When they are ready let them cool to room temperature.
4. In a bowl mix the feta cheese, mozzarella, cottage cheese and the eggs.
5. Add to the bowl olive oil, water, flour, baking powder, parsley, green onions, salt and pepper. Mix it all well.
6. I used a mini pumpkin baking sheet, if you don‚Äôt have a pan like that, you can use a regular cupcake pan.
7. Grease the baking sheet with butter.
8. Lay a thin layer of sweet potato cubes, add on top the cheese mixture, add on top more sweet potato cubes. (like in the picture).
9. Bake it in a preheated oven for 400F for 25-30 minutes until it‚Äôs ready and golden!
10. For the decoration, stick a stem of rosemary in each of the pastries.
11. Enjoy! Please share pics and tag me! üôè

name: So cold here in BostonBrrrrr! All you need is a bowl of creamy fallsoup to warm you up! Recipe below
ingredients: 4 sweet potatoes with the skin cut on the long side to half
1 whole garlic cut at the top
1 teaspoon of sea salt for the squash, sweet potato and garlic
1/2 tablespoon of salt for the pot.
1. Preheat the oven to 420F. On a baking sheet put the squash, sweet potato and garlic. Drizzle the olive oil and 1 teaspoon of sea salt. Bake it for 30 minutes, until they are soft and caramelized.
2. On a medium heat, put in a pot, 2 tablespoons of olive oil. Saut√© the onion and the carrots for 5 minutes.
3. When the squash and the sweet potato are ready, using an ice cream scooper or a spoon, take out all the inside of the squash, sweet potato and the garlic cloves.
4. Add it to the pot with the saut√©ed carrots and the onion.
5. Add all the spices - salt, honey, cumin, smoked paprika and cinnamon.
6. Add the butter and mix it all.
7. Add the boiled water and cook it for 30 minutes.
8. Using an immersion blender, blend the mixture.
9. Serve it in a bowl with some heavy cream or just a bit of sumac, chives and good salty crackers.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 420F. On a baking sheet put the squash, sweet potato and garlic. Drizzle the olive oil and 1 teaspoon of sea salt. Bake it for 30 minutes, until they are soft and caramelized.
On a medium heat, put in a pot, 2 tablespoons of olive oil. Saut√© the onion and the carrots for 5 minutes.
When the squash and the sweet potato are ready, using an ice cream scooper or a spoon, take out all the inside of the squash, sweet potato and the garlic cloves.
Add it to the pot with the saut√©ed carrots and the onion.
Add all the spices - salt, honey, cumin, smoked paprika and cinnamon.
Add the butter and mix it all.
Add the boiled water and cook it for 30 minutes.
Using an immersion blender, blend the mixture.
Serve it in a bowl with some heavy cream or just a bit of sumac, chives and good salty crackers.
Enjoy! Share pics with meüôèü§ó

instructions: Mediterranean Style Stir Fry

name: Zaatar & Feta Cheese Pull-Apart Swirls!
ingredients: 200 grams (7 ounces) of Crumble Feta Cheese
1/4 cup of Za‚Äôatar spices mix with 1/2 cup of olive oil
instructions:
4 cups of all purpose flour 
1 tablespoon of dry yeast 
1/3 cup of olive oil
3 tablespoons of sugar 
1 teaspoon of salt 
1 1/4 cups of lukewarm water

Filling- 
200 grams (7 ounces) of Crumble Feta Cheese
1/4 cup of Za‚Äôatar spices mix with 1/2 cup of olive oil 

Method- 
In a blender put the flour, yeast and sugar blend it for 2 minutes in a medium speed
Add the olive oil, salt and water
Blend it for 7 minutes in medium speed
If you feel in your hands that the dough needs more water or flour add a bit
Cover the dough with aluminum foil for at least an hour
Brush it with the Za‚Äôatar and oil mix
Spread half of the feta cheese on the dough
Slice it to 1 inches circles
Place each piece flat side down in a greased cake pan (see the the photo)
Let it rise for 30 minutes

name: CAST IRON PAN-ROASTED CHICKEN!
ingredients: Add 6 garlic cloves and 4 thyme springs to infuse with the oil.
instructions:
üåüRecipe: 
Cast Iron-Chicken Tenderloin!üçã

Ingredients- 
2 pounds of chicken tenderloin
4 tablespoons of olive oil
6 garlic cloves
1/2 teaspoon of smoked paprika 
1 teaspoon of mediterranean Sea salt 
1/2 teaspoon of ground pepper 
4 thyme springs 
2 shallots cut to quarters 

Method - 
Season the chicken tenderloin liberally with Mediterranean salt and freshly ground black pepper and let it sit in room temperature for 10 minutes
On medium heat, put 4 tablespoons of olive oil in the pan and let it heat up to a light smoke

Season with the smoked paprika and salt 
Sear it for 3 minutes until there is a crust

Flip to the other side for 3 more minutes 
Add 6 garlic cloves and 4 thyme springs to infuse with the oil
Add the sliced shallots to the pan

Add 1 lime cut to quarters 
Cook for 5 more minutes

name: Want to kick your rice up a notch Try this comforting Iraqi Red Rice! My family simply could not put
instructions:
Iraqi Red Rice
2 cups of basmati rice 
4 cups of boiled water
1 chopped sweet onion 
1 chopped tomato
3 tablespoons of tomato paste
5 tablespoons of olive oil
1/2 tablespoon of red paprika 
3/4 tablespoon of salt
1/2 teaspoon of black pepper 

In a skillet pan on medium heat put the olive oil
Saut√© the onion about 5 minutes until it is golden

Add the chopped tomato, paprika, tomato paste, salt and pepper 
Stir for 2 minutes to open the flavors
Add the rice and stir until the rice gets the red color

Add 4 cups of boiled water
Cover and cook for 25 minutes on low heat
Let the rice sit for 5 minutes before you serve

Chopped fresh dill

Add chopped dill on the top of the fennel and serve it warm or cold

name: Beef Kebab with sumac onions and lots of Tahina on top! Delish!  On top of the kebab -
ingredients: 4 tablespoons of cold water -Knead the mixture for at least 15 minutes with your hand. -make the kebab into round, slightly flattened balls
instructions: Beef Kebab with sumac onions and lots of Tahina on top

üî•üòã On top of the kebab - 
Sweet onions with sumac inspired by my dad who taught me how to make this refreshing topping üíúüßÖ Full recipe below:

2 pounds of ground beef 85/15
1 bunch of parsley, finely chopped 
1 bunch of cilantro, finely chopped
A few mint leaves, finely chopped 
5 minced garlic cloves
1 sweet onion, finely chopped
1 tablespoon of kosher salt
1 tablespoon of ground black pepper 
1/2 tablespoon of cumin 
4 tablespoons of olive oil
4 tablespoons of cold water -Knead the mixture for at least 15 minutes with your hand

-make the kebab into round, slightly flattened balls
(You can put the mixture in the fridge until you want to make the kebabs) 
Put it on the grill until it reaches the desired level of cook
Drizzle Tahini on top and enjoy
